oauthResource.title: OAuth2 resource
oauthResource.description: OAuth2 resource used to validate token. Supports EL.

oauthCacheResource.title: Cache resource
oauthCacheResource.description: Cache resource used to store the tokens.

extractPayload.title: Extract OAuth2 payload
extractPayload.description: Push the token endpoint payload into the 'oauth.payload' context attribute.

checkRequiredScopes.title: Check scopes
checkRequiredScopes.description: Check required scopes to access the resource

requiredScopes.title: Required scopes
requiredScopes.description: List of required scopes to access the resource.

modeStrict.title: Mode strict
modeStrict.description: Check scopes with exactly those configured

ignoreMissing.title: Ignore missing CNF
ignoreMissing.description: Will ignore CNF validation if the token doesn't contain any CNF information. Default is false.

enabled.title: Enable certificate bound thumbprint validation
enabled.description: Will validate the certificate thumbprint extracted from the access_token with the one provided by the client. The default is false.

extractCertificateFromHeader.title: Extract client certificate from headers
extractCertificateFromHeader.description: Enabled to extract the client certificate from request header. Necessary when the M-TLS connection is handled by a proxy.

headerName.title: Header name
headerName.description: Name of the header where to find the client certificate.

propagateAuthHeader.title: Permit authorization header to the target endpoints
propagateAuthHeader.description: Allows to propagate Authorization header to the target endpoints
